ROOALL STANZA. BY THY GRACE

gurmukhi: Awid rUp Anwid mUriq Ajoin purK Apwr ]
translation_english: Thou art the Supreme Purush, an Eternal Entity in the beginning and free from birth.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਆਦਿ ਰੂਪ ਅਨਾਦਿ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਅਜੋਨਿ ਪੁਰਖ ਅਪਾਰ ॥

gurmukhi: srb mwn iqRmwn dyv AByv Awid audwr ]
translation_english: Worshipped by all and venerated by three gods, Thou art without difference and art Generous from the very beginning.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਸਰਬ ਮਾਨ ਤ੍ਰਿਮਾਨ ਦੇਵ ਅਭੇਵ ਆਦਿ ਉਦਾਰ ॥

gurmukhi: srb pwlk srb Gwlk srb ko puin kwl ]
translation_english: Thou art the Creator Sustainer, Inspirer and Destroyer of all.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਸਰਬ ਪਾਲਕ ਸਰਬ ਘਾਲਕ ਸਰਬ ਕੋ ਪੁਨਿ ਕਾਲ ॥

gurmukhi: j`qR q`qR ibrwjhI AvDUq rUp irswl ]79]
translation_english: Thou art present everywhere like an ascetic with a Generous disposition.79.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਜੱਤ੍ਰ ਤੱਤ੍ਰ ਬਿਰਾਜਹੀ ਅਵਧੂਤ ਰੂਪ ਰਿਸਾਲ ॥੭੯॥

gurmukhi: nwm Twm n jwiq jwkr rUp rMg n ryK ]
translation_english: Thou art Nameless, Placeless, Casteless, Formless, Colourless and Lineless.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨਾਮ ਠਾਮ ਨ ਜਾਤਿ ਜਾਕਰ ਰੂਪ ਰੰਗ ਨ ਰੇਖ ॥

gurmukhi: Awid purK audwr mUriq Ajoin Awid AsyK ]
translation_english: Thou, the Primal Purusha, art Unborn, Generous Entity and Perfect from the very beginning.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਆਦਿ ਪੁਰਖ ਉਦਾਰ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਅਜੋਨਿ ਆਦਿ ਅਸੇਖ ॥

gurmukhi: dys AOr n Bys jwkr rUp ryK n rwg ]
translation_english: Thou art Countryless, Garbless, Formless, Lineless and Non-attached.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਦੇਸ ਔਰ ਨ ਭੇਸ ਜਾਕਰ ਰੂਪ ਰੇਖ ਨ ਰਾਗ ॥

gurmukhi: j`qR q`qR idsw ivsw huie PYilE Anurwg ]80]
translation_english: Thou art present in all direction and conners and Pervadest the Universe as Love.80.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਜੱਤ੍ਰ ਤੱਤ੍ਰ ਦਿਸਾ ਵਿਸਾ ਹੁਇ ਫੈਲਿਓ ਅਨੁਰਾਗ ॥੮੦॥

gurmukhi: nwm kwm ibhIn pyKq Dwm hUM nih jwih ]
translation_english: Thou appearest without name and desire, thou hast no particular Abode.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨਾਮ ਕਾਮ ਬਿਹੀਨ ਪੇਖਤ ਧਾਮ ਹੂੰ ਨਹਿ ਜਾਹਿ ॥

gurmukhi: srb mwn srb`qR mwn sdYv mwnq qwih ]
translation_english: Thou, being worshipped by all, art the Enjoyer of all.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਸਰਬ ਮਾਨ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਮਾਨ ਸਦੈਵ ਮਾਨਤ ਤਾਹਿ ॥

gurmukhi: eyk mUriq Anyk drsn kIn rUp Anyk ]
translation_english: Thou, the One Entity, appearest as Many creating innumerable forms.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਏਕ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਅਨੇਕ ਦਰਸਨ ਕੀਨ ਰੂਪ ਅਨੇਕ ॥

gurmukhi: Kyl Kyl AKyl Kyln AMq ko iPir eyk ]81]
translation_english: After playing the world-drama, when Thou wilt stop the play, Thou wilt be the same One again.81.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਖੇਲ ਖੇਲ ਅਖੇਲ ਖੇਲਨ ਅੰਤ ਕੋ ਫਿਰਿ ਏਕ ॥੮੧॥

gurmukhi: dyv Byv n jwnhI ijh byd Aaur kqyb ]
translation_english: The gods and the Scriptures of Hindus and Muslims do not know Thy secret.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਦੇਵ ਭੇਵ ਨ ਜਾਨਹੀ ਜਿਹ ਬੇਦ ਅਉਰ ਕਤੇਬ ॥

gurmukhi: rUp rMg n jwiq pwiq su jwneI ikNh jyb ]
translation_english: How to know Thee when thou art Formless, Colourless, Casteless and without lineage?
gurmukhi_unicode: ਰੂਪ ਰੰਗ ਨ ਜਾਤਿ ਪਾਤਿ ਸੁ ਜਾਨਈ ਕਿਂਹ ਜੇਬ ॥

gurmukhi: qwq mwq n jwq jwkr jnm mrn ibhIn ]
translation_english: Thou art without father and mother and art casteless, Thou art without births and deaths.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਤਾਤ ਮਾਤ ਨ ਜਾਤ ਜਾਕਰ ਜਨਮ ਮਰਨ ਬਿਹੀਨ ॥

gurmukhi: c`kR b`kR iPrY cqur c`k mwnhI pur qIn ]82]
translation_english: Thou movest fast like the disc in all the four directions and art worshipped by the three worlds. 82.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਬੱਕ੍ਰ ਫਿਰੈ ਚਤੁਰ ਚੱਕ ਮਾਨਹੀ ਪੁਰ ਤੀਨ ॥੮੨॥

gurmukhi: lok caudh ky ibKY jg jwphI ijNh jwp ]
translation_english: The Name is recited in the fourteen divisions of the universe.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਲੋਕ ਚਉਦਹ ਕੇ ਬਿਖੈ ਜਗ ਜਾਪਹੀ ਜਿਂਹ ਜਾਪ ॥

gurmukhi: Awid dyv Anwid mUriq QwipE sbY ijNh Qwp ]
translation_english: Thou, the Primal God, art Eternal Entity and hast created the entire universe.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਆਦਿ ਦੇਵ ਅਨਾਦਿ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਥਾਪਿਓ ਸਬੈ ਜਿਂਹ ਥਾਪ ॥

gurmukhi: prm rUp punIq mUriq pUrn purK Apwr ]
translation_english: Thou, the holiest Entity, art of Supreme Form, Thou art Bondless, Perfect Purusha.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਪਰਮ ਰੂਪ ਪੁਨੀਤ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਪੂਰਨ ਪੁਰਖ ਅਪਾਰ ॥

gurmukhi: srb ibsÍ ricE suXMBv gVn BMjnhwr ]83]
translation_english: Thou, the Self-Existent, Creator and Destroyer, hast crated the whole universe.83.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਸਰਬ ਬਿਸ੍ਵ ਰਚਿਓ ਸੁਯੰਭਵ ਗੜਨ ਭੰਜਨਹਾਰ ॥੮੩॥

gurmukhi: kwl hIn klw sMjugiq Akwl purK Adys ]
translation_english: Thou art Dearthless, Almighty, Timeless Purasha and Countryless.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਾਲ ਹੀਨ ਕਲਾ ਸੰਜੁਗਤਿ ਅਕਾਲ ਪੁਰਖ ਅਦੇਸ ॥

gurmukhi: Drm Dwm su Brm rihq ABUq AlK ABys ]
translation_english: Thou art the Abode of righteousness; Thou art Illusionless, Garbless, Incomprehensible and devoid of five elements.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਧਰਮ ਧਾਮ ਸੁ ਭਰਮ ਰਹਿਤ ਅਭੂਤ ਅਲਖ ਅਭੇਸ ॥

gurmukhi: AMg rwg n rMg jwkih jwiq pwiq n nwm ]
translation_english: Thou art without body, without attachment, without colour, caste, lineage and name.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਅੰਗ ਰਾਗ ਨ ਰੰਗ ਜਾਕਹਿ ਜਾਤਿ ਪਾਤਿ ਨ ਨਾਮ ॥

gurmukhi: grb gMjn dust BMjn mukiq dwiek kwm ]84]
translation_english: Thou art the Destroyer of ego, the vanquisher of tyrants and performer of works leading to salvation.84.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਗਰਬ ਗੰਜਨ ਦੁਸਟ ਭੰਜਨ ਮੁਕਤਿ ਦਾਇਕ ਕਾਮ ॥੮੪॥

gurmukhi: Awp rUp AmIk An ausqiq eyk purK AvDUq ]
translation_english: Thou art the Deepest and Indescribable Entity, the One unique ascetic Purusha.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਆਪ ਰੂਪ ਅਮੀਕ ਅਨ ਉਸਤਤਿ ਏਕ ਪੁਰਖ ਅਵਧੂਤ ॥

gurmukhi: grb gMjn srb BMjn Awid rUp AsUq ]
translation_english: Thou, the Unborn Primal Entity, art the Destroyer of all egocentric people.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਗਰਬ ਗੰਜਨ ਸਰਬ ਭੰਜਨ ਆਦਿ ਰੂਪ ਅਸੂਤ ॥

gurmukhi: AMg hIn ABMg Anwqm eyk purK Apwr ]
translation_english: Thou, the Boundless Purusha, art Limbless, Indestructible and without self.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਅੰਗ ਹੀਨ ਅਭੰਗ ਅਨਾਤਮ ਏਕ ਪੁਰਖ ਅਪਾਰ ॥

gurmukhi: srb lwiek srb Gwiek srb ko pRiqpwr ]85]
translation_english: Thou art capable of doing everything, Thou Destroyest all and Sustainest all.85.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਸਰਬ ਲਾਇਕ ਸਰਬ ਘਾਇਕ ਸਰਬ ਕੋ ਪ੍ਰਤਿਪਾਰ ॥੮੫॥

gurmukhi: srb gMqw srb hMqw srb qy AnByK ]
translation_english: Thou knowest all, Destroyest all and art beyond all the guises.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਸਰਬ ਗੰਤਾ ਸਰਬ ਹੰਤਾ ਸਰਬ ਤੇ ਅਨਭੇਖ ॥

gurmukhi: srb swsqR n jwnhI ijNh rUp rMgu Aru ryK ]
translation_english: Thy form, colour and marks are not known to all the Scriptures.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਸਰਬ ਸਾਸਤ੍ਰ ਨ ਜਾਨਹੀ ਜਿਂਹ ਰੂਪ ਰੰਗੁ ਅਰੁ ਰੇਖ ॥

gurmukhi: prm byd purwx jwkih nyq BwKq in`q ]
translation_english: The Vedas and the Puransa always declare Thee the Supreme and the Greatest.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਪਰਮ ਬੇਦ ਪੁਰਾਣ ਜਾਕਹਿ ਨੇਤ ਭਾਖਤ ਨਿੱਤ ॥

gurmukhi: koit isMimRq purwn swsqR n AwveI vhu ic`iq ]86]
translation_english: None can comprehend thee completely through millions of Smritis, Puranas and Shastras.86.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕੋਟਿ ਸਿੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਪੁਰਾਨ ਸਾਸਤ੍ਰ ਨ ਆਵਈ ਵਹੁ ਚਿੱਤਿ ॥੮੬॥

translation_english: MADHUBHAR STANZA. BY THY GRACE
The Virtues like Generosity and Thy Praises are Unbouded.
Thy seat is Eternal, Thy Eminence is Perfect.87.
Thou art Self-luminous and remianest the same during day and night.
They arms stretch upto Thy knees and Thou art king of kings.88.
Thou art king of kings, sun of suns.
Thou art God of gods and of greatest Eminence.89.
Thou art Indra of Indras, Smallest of the Small.
Thou art Poorest of the Poor and Death of Deaths.90.
Thy Limbs are not of five elements, Thy glow is Eternal.

gurmukhi: giq imiq Apwr ] gun gn audwr ]91]
translation_english: Thou art Immeasurable and Thy Virtues like Generosity are countless.91
gurmukhi_unicode: ਗਤਿ ਮਿਤਿ ਅਪਾਰ ॥ ਗੁਨ ਗਨ ਉਦਾਰ ॥੯੧॥

translation_english: Thou art Fearless and Desireless and all the Sages bow before Thee.

gurmukhi: Aiq duiq pRcMf ] imiq giq AKMf ]92]
translation_english: Thou, of the brightest effulgence, art perfect in Thy Doings.92.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਅਤਿ ਦੁਤਿ ਪ੍ਰਚੰਡ ॥ ਮਿਤਿ ਗਤਿ ਅਖੰਡ ॥੯੨॥

translation_english: Thy works are spontaneous and Thy laws are ideal.
Thou Thyself art wholly ornamented and none can chastise Thee.93.
CHACHARI STANZA BY THY GRACE
O the Preserver Lord! O Salvation-Giver Lord! O Most Genereous Lord! O Boundless Lord! 94.
O Destroyer Lord! O the Creator Lord! O the Nameless Lord! O the Desireless Lord! 95.
BHUJANG PRYAAT STANZA

gurmukhi: c`qR c`kR krqw ] c`qR c`kR hrqw ]
translation_english: O the Creator Lord of all the four directions. O the Destroyer Lord of the four directions.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਚੱਤ੍ਰ ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਕਰਤਾ ॥ ਚੱਤ੍ਰ ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਹਰਤਾ ॥

gurmukhi: c`qR c`kR dwny ] c`qR c`kR jwny ]96]

gurmukhi_unicode: ਚੱਤ੍ਰ ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਦਾਨੇ ॥ ਚੱਤ੍ਰ ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਜਾਨੇ ॥੯੬॥

gurmukhi: c`qR c`kR vrqI ] c`qR c`kR BrqI ]
translation_english: O the Pervading Lord of the four directions. O the Permeator Lord of all the four direction.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਚੱਤ੍ਰ ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਵਰਤੀ ॥ ਚੱਤ੍ਰ ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਭਰਤੀ ॥

gurmukhi: c`qR c`kR pwly ] c`qR c`kR kwly ]97]
translation_english: O the Sustainer Lord of all the four directions. O the Destroyer Lord of all the four directions.97.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਚੱਤ੍ਰ ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਪਾਲੇ ॥ ਚੱਤ੍ਰ ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਕਾਲੇ ॥੯੭॥

gurmukhi: c`qR c`kR pwsy ] c`qR c`kR vwsy ]
translation_english: O the Lord Present in all the four direction. O the Dweller Lord in all the four directions.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਚੱਤ੍ਰ ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਪਾਸੇ ॥ ਚੱਤ੍ਰ ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਵਾਸੇ ॥

gurmukhi: c`qR c`kR mwnXY ] c`qR c`kR dwnXY ]98]
translation_english: O the Lord Worshipped in all the four directions. O the Donor Lord of all the four directions.98.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਚੱਤ੍ਰ ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਮਾਨਯੈ ॥ ਚੱਤ੍ਰ ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਦਾਨਯੈ ॥੯੮॥

translation_english: CHACHARI STANZA

gurmukhi: n s`qRY ] n im`qRY ] n BrmM ] n iB`qRY ]99]
translation_english: Thou art the Foeless Lord, Thou art the Friendless Lord, Thou art the Illusionless Lord, Thou art the Fearless Lord.99.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨ ਸੱਤ੍ਰੈ ॥ ਨ ਮਿੱਤ੍ਰੈ ॥ ਨ ਭਰਮੰ ॥ ਨ ਭਿੱਤ੍ਰੈ ॥੯੯॥

gurmukhi: n krmM ] n kwey ] AjnmM ] Ajwey ]100]
translation_english: Thou art the Actionless Lord, Thou art the Bodyless Lord, Thu art the Birthless Lord, Thou art the Aboleless Lord.100.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨ ਕਰਮੰ ॥ ਨ ਕਾਏ ॥ ਅਜਨਮੰ ॥ ਅਜਾਏ ॥੧੦੦॥

gurmukhi: n ic`qRY ] n im`qRY ] pry hYN ] piv`qRY ]101]
translation_english: Thou art the Portrait-less Lord, Thou art the Friendliness Lord, Thou art the Attachment-free Lord, Thou art the Most Pure Lord.101.
Thou art the World-Master Lord, Thou art the Primal Lord, Thou art the Primal Lord, Thou art the Invincible Lord, Thou art the Almighty Lord.102.
BHAGVATI STANZA. UTTERED WITH THY GRACE

gurmukhi: ik AwiC`j dysY ] ik AwiB`j BysY ]
translation_english: That thy Abode is unconquerable. That Thy Garb is unimpaired.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਆਛਿੱਜ ਦੇਸੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਆਭਿੱਜ ਭੇਸੈ ॥

gurmukhi: ik AwgMj krmY ] ik AwBMj BrmY ]103]
translation_english: That Thou art beyond impact of Karmas. That Thou art free from doubts.103.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਆਗੰਜ ਕਰਮੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਆਭੰਜ ਭਰਮੈ ॥੧੦੩॥

gurmukhi: ik AwiBj lokY ] ik Awidq sokY ]
translation_english: That Thy abode is unimpaired. That thy canst dry up the sun.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਆਭਿਜ ਲੋਕੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਆਦਿਤ ਸੋਕੈ ॥

gurmukhi: ik AvDUq brnY ] ik ibBUq krnY ]104]
translation_english: That Thy demeanour is saintly. That thou art the Source of wealth.104.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਅਵਧੂਤ ਬਰਨੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਬਿਭੂਤ ਕਰਨੈ ॥੧੦੪॥

gurmukhi: ik rwjM pRBw hYN ] ik DrmM Dujw hYN]
translation_english: That Thou art the glory of kingdom. That Thou art eh ensign of righteousness.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਰਾਜੰ ਪ੍ਰਭਾ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਧਰਮੰ ਧੁਜਾ ਹੈਂ॥

gurmukhi: ik Awsok brnY ] ik srbw ABrnY ]105]
translation_english: That Thou hast no worries. That Thou art the ornamentation of all.105.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਆਸੋਕ ਬਰਨੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਰਬਾ ਅਭਰਨੈ ॥੧੦੫॥

gurmukhi: ik jgqM ikRqI hYN ] ik CqRM CqRI hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art the Creator of the universe. That Thou art the Bravest of the Brave.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਜਗਤੰ ਕ੍ਰਿਤੀ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਛਤ੍ਰੰ ਛਤ੍ਰੀ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: ik bRhmM srUpY ] ik AnBau AnUpY ]106]
translation_english: That Thou art All-Pervading Entity. That Thou art the Source of Divine Knowledge.106.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਬ੍ਰਹਮੰ ਸਰੂਪੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਅਨਭਉ ਅਨੂਪੈ ॥੧੦੬॥

gurmukhi: ik Awid Adyv hYN ] ik Awip AByv hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art the Primal Entity without a Master. That Thou art self-illumined.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਆਦਿ ਅਦੇਵ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਆਪਿ ਅਭੇਵ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: ik ic`qRM ibhInY ] ik eykY ADInY ]107]
translation_english: That Thou art without any portrait. That Thou art Master of Thyself.107.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਚਿੱਤ੍ਰੰ ਬਿਹੀਨੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਏਕੈ ਅਧੀਨੈ ॥੧੦੭॥

translation_english: That Thou art the Sustainer and Generous. That Thou art the Re-deemer and Pure.

gurmukhi: ik pwk ibAYb hYN ] ik ZYbul ZYb hYN ]108]
translation_english: That Thou art Flawless. That Thou art most Mysterious.108.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਪਾਕ ਬਿਐਬ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਗ਼ੈਬੁਲ ਗ਼ੈਬ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੦੮॥

gurmukhi: ik A&vul gunwh hYN ] ik Swhwn Swh hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou forgivest sins. That Thou art the Emperor of Emperors.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਅਫ਼ਵੁਲ ਗੁਨਾਹ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਸ਼ਾਹਾਨ ਸ਼ਾਹ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: ik kwrn kuinMd hYN ] ik rozI idhMd hYN ]109]
translation_english: That Thou art Doer of everything. That Thou art the Giver of the means of sustenance.109.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਕਾਰਨ ਕੁਨਿੰਦ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਰੋਜ਼ੀ ਦਿਹੰਦ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੦੯॥

gurmukhi: ik rwzk rhIm hYN ] ik krmM krIm hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art the Generous Sustainer. That Thou art the Most Compassionate.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਰਾਜ਼ਕ ਰਹੀਮ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਕਰਮੰ ਕਰੀਮ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: ik srbM klI hYN ] ik srbM dlI hYN ]110]
translation_english: That Thou art Omnipotent. That Thou art the Destroyer of all.110.

gurmukhi: ik srb`qR gaunY ] ik srb`qR BaunY ]111]

gurmukhi: ik srb`qR dysY ] ik srb`qR BysY ]

gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਦੇਸੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਭੇਸੈ ॥

gurmukhi: ik srb`qR rwjY ] ik srb`qR swjY ]112]

gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਰਾਜੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਸਾਜੈ ॥੧੧੨॥

gurmukhi: ik srb`qR dInY ] ik srb`qR lInY ]
translation_english: That Thou be longest to all religious. That Thou art within everyone.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਦੀਨੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਲੀਨੈ ॥

gurmukhi: ik srb`qR jwho ] ik srb`qR Bwho ]113]
translation_english: That Thou livest everywhere. That Thou art the Glory of all. 113.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਜਾਹੋ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਭਾਹੋ ॥੧੧੩॥

gurmukhi: ik srb`qR dysY ] ik srb`qR BysY ]
translation_english: That Thou art in all the countries. That Thou art in all the garbs.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਦੇਸੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਭੇਸੈ ॥

gurmukhi: ik srb`qR kwlY ] ik srb`qR pwlY ]114]
translation_english: That Thou art the Destroyer of all. That Thou art the Sustainer of all. 114.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਕਾਲੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਪਾਲੈ ॥੧੧੪॥

gurmukhi: ik srb`qR hMqw ] ik srb`qR gMqw ]
translation_english: That Thou destroyest all. That Thou goest to all the places.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਹੰਤਾ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਗੰਤਾ ॥

gurmukhi: ik srb`qR ByKI ] ik srb`qR pyKI ]115]
translation_english: That Thou wearest all the garbs. That Thou seest all. 115.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਭੇਖੀ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਪੇਖੀ ॥੧੧੫॥

gurmukhi: ik srb`qR kwjY ] ik srb`qR rwjY ]
translation_english: That Thou art the cause of all. That Thou art the Glory of all.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਕਾਜੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਰਾਜੈ ॥

gurmukhi: ik srb`qR soKY ] ik srb`qR poKY ]116]
translation_english: That Thou driest up all. That Thou fillest up all. 116.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਸੋਖੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਪੋਖੈ ॥੧੧੬॥

gurmukhi: ik srb`qR qRwxY ] ik srb`qR pRwxY ]
translation_english: That Thou art the Strength of all. That Thou art the life of all.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਤ੍ਰਾਣੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਪ੍ਰਾਣੈ ॥

gurmukhi: ik srb`qR dysY ] ik srb`qR BysY ]117]
translation_english: That Thou art in all countries. That Thou art in garbs. 117.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਦੇਸੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਭੇਸੈ ॥੧੧੭॥

translation_english: That Thou art worshipped everywhere. That Thou art the Supreme Controller of all.

gurmukhi: ik srb`qR jwipXY ] ik srb`qR QwipXY ]118]
translation_english: That Thou art remembered everywhere. That Thou art established everywhere. 118.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਜਾਪਿਯੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਥਾਪਿਯੈ ॥੧੧੮॥

gurmukhi: ik srb`qR BwnY ] ik srb`qR mwnY ]
translation_english: That Thou illuminest everything. That Thou art honoured by all.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਭਾਨੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਮਾਨੈ ॥

gurmukhi: ik srb`qR ieMdRY ] ik srb`qR cMdRY ]119]
translation_english: That Thou art Indra (King) of all. That Thou art the moon (Light) of all. 119.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਇੰਦ੍ਰੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਰਬੱਤ੍ਰ ਚੰਦ੍ਰੈ ॥੧੧੯॥

translation_english: That Thou art master off all powers. That Thou art Most Intelligent.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਰਬੰ ਕਲੀਮੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਪਰਮੰ ਫ਼ਹੀਮੈ ॥

gurmukhi: ik Awikl AlwmY ] ik swihb klwmY ]120]
translation_english: That Thou art Most Wise and Learned. That Thou art the Master of Languages. 120.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਆਕਿਲ ਅਲਾਮੈ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਾਹਿਬ ਕਲਾਮੈ ॥੧੨੦॥

gurmukhi: ik husnl vjU hYN ] qmwmul rujU hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art the Embodiment of Beauty. That all look towards Thee.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਹੁਸਨਲ ਵਜੂ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਤਮਾਮੁਲ ਰੁਜੂ ਹੈਂ ॥

translation_english: That Thou abidest forever. That Thou hast perpetual offspring. 121.
That Thou art the conquereror of mighty enemies. That Thou art the Protector of the lowly.
That Thy Abode is the Highest. That Thou Pervadest on Earth and in Heavens. 122.
That Thou discriminatest all. That Thou art most Considerate.
That Thou art the Greatest Friend. That Thou art certainlyhe Giver of food.123.

gurmukhi: Anykul qrMg hYN ] AByd hYN ABMg hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou, as Ocean, Hast innumerable waves. That Thou art Immortal and none can know Thy secrets.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਅਨੇਕੁਲ ਤਰੰਗ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਅਭੇਦ ਹੈਂ ਅਭੰਗ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: AzIzul invwz hYN ] ZnImul i^rwj hYN ]124]
translation_english: That Thou Protectest the devotees. That Thou punishest the evil-doers.124.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਅਜ਼ੀਜ਼ੁਲ ਨਿਵਾਜ਼ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਗ਼ਨੀਮੁਲ ਖ਼ਿਰਾਜ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੨੪॥

gurmukhi: inrukq srUp hYN ] iqRmukiq ibBUq hYN ]
translation_english: That Thy Entity is Indexpressible. That Thy Glory is Beyond the three Modes.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨਿਰੁਕਤ ਸਰੂਪ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਤ੍ਰਿਮੁਕਤਿ ਬਿਭੂਤ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: pRBugiq pRBw hYN ] sujugiq suDw hYN ]125]
translation_english: That Thine is the Most Powerful Glow. That Thou art ever united with all.125.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਪ੍ਰਭੁਗਤਿ ਪ੍ਰਭਾ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਸੁਜੁਗਤਿ ਸੁਧਾ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੨੫॥

gurmukhi: sdYvM srUp hYN ] ABydI AnUp hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art Eternal Entity. That Thou art undivided and unparalleled.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਸਦੈਵੰ ਸਰੂਪ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਅਭੇਦੀ ਅਨੂਪ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: smsqo prwj hYN ] sdw srb swj hYN ]126]
translation_english: That Thou art the Creator of all. That Thou art ever the Ornamentation of all. 126.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਸਮਸਤੋ ਪਰਾਜ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਸਦਾ ਸਰਬ ਸਾਜ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੨੬॥

gurmukhi: smsqul slwm hYN ] sdYvl Akwm hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art saluted by all. That Thou art ever the Desireless Lord.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਸਮਸਤੁਲ ਸਲਾਮ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਸਦੈਵਲ ਅਕਾਮ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: inRbwD srUp hYN ] AgwD hYN AnUp hYN ]127]
translation_english: That Thou art Invincible. That Thou art Impenetrable and Unparalleled Entity.127.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨ੍ਰਿਬਾਧ ਸਰੂਪ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਅਗਾਧ ਹੈਂ ਅਨੂਪ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੨੭॥

translation_english: That Thou art Aum the primal Entity. That Thou art also without beginning.
That Thu art Bodyless and Nameless. That Thou art the Destroyer and Restorer of three modes. 128.
That Thou art the Destroyer of three gods and modes. That Thou art Immortal and Impenetrable.

gurmukhi: suBM srb Bwgy ] su srbw Anurwgy]129]
translation_english: That Thy Writ of Destiny is for all. That Thou lovest all. 129.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਸੁਭੰ ਸਰਬ ਭਾਗੇ ॥ ਸੁ ਸਰਬਾ ਅਨੁਰਾਗੇ॥੧੨੯॥

gurmukhi: iqRBugq srUp hYN ] AiC`j hYN ACUq hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art the Enjoyer Entity of three worlds. That Thou art Unbreakable and untouched.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਤ੍ਰਿਭੁਗਤ ਸਰੂਪ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਅਛਿੱਜ ਹੈਂ ਅਛੂਤ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: ik nrkM pRxws hYN ] ipRQIaul pRvws hYN ]130]
translation_english: That Thou art the Destroyer of hell. That Thou Pervadest the Earth. 130.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਨਰਕੰ ਪ੍ਰਣਾਸ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਪ੍ਰਿਥੀਉਲ ਪ੍ਰਵਾਸ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੩੦॥

gurmukhi: inrukiq pRBw hYN ] sdYvM sdw hYN ]
translation_english: That Thy Glory is Inexpressible. That Thou art Eternal.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨਿਰੁਕਤਿ ਪ੍ਰਭਾ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਸਦੈਵੰ ਸਦਾ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: ibBugiq srUp hYN ] pRjugiq AnUp hYN ]131]
translation_english: That Thou abidest in innumerable diverse guises. That Thou art wonderfully united with all. 131.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਬਿਭੁਗਤਿ ਸਰੂਪ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਪ੍ਰਜੁਗਤਿ ਅਨੂਪ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੩੧॥

gurmukhi: inrukiq sdw hYN ] ibBugiq pRBw hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art ever Inexpressible. That Thy Glory appears in diverse guises.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨਿਰੁਕਤਿ ਸਦਾ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਬਿਭੁਗਤਿ ਪ੍ਰਭਾ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: Anaukiq srUp hYN ] pRjugiq AnUp hYN ]132]
translation_english: That Thy Form is Indescribable. That Thou art wonderfully united with all. 132.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਅਨਉਕਤਿ ਸਰੂਪ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਪ੍ਰਜੁਗਤਿ ਅਨੂਪ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੩੨॥

translation_english: CHACHARI STANZA
Thou art Indestructible, Thou art Limbless.
Thou art Dessless, Thou art Indescribable. 133.
Thou art Illusionless, Thou art Actionless.
Thou art Beginningless, Thou art from the beginning of ages. 134.
Thou art Unconquerable, Thou art Indestuctible.
Thou art Elementless, Thou art Fearless. 135.
Thou art Eternal, Thou art Non-attached.
Thou art Non-involyed, Thou art Unbound. 136.
Thou art Indivisible, Thou art Non-attached.
Thou art Eternal, Thou art Supreme Light. 137.
Thou art Carefree, Thou canst restrain the senses.
Thou canst control the mind, Thou art Invincible. 138.
Thou art Accountless, Thou art Garbless.
Thou art Coastless, Thou art Bottomless. 139.
Thou art Unborn, Thou art Bottomless.
Thou art Countless, Thou art Beginningless. 140.
Thou art Causeless, Thou art the Listener.
Thou art Unborn, Thou art free. 141.
CHARPAT STANZA. BY THE GRACE
Thou art the Destroyer of all. Thou art the Goer to all.
Thou art well-known to all. Thou art the knower of all. 142.
Thou Killest all. Thou Createst all.
Thou art the Life of all. Thou art the Strength of all. 143.
Thou art in all works. Thou art in all Religions.
Thou art united with all. Thou art free from all. 144.
RASAAVAL STANZA. BY THY GRACE
Salutation to Thee O Destroyer of Hell Lord! Salutation to Thee O Ever-Illumined Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Bodyless Entity Lord! Salutation to Thee O Eternal and Effulgent Lord! 145.
Salutation to Thee O Destroyer of Tyrants Lord! Salutation to Thee O Companion of all Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Impenetrable Entity Lord! Salution to Thee O Non-annoying Glorious Lord! 146.
Salutation to Thee O Limbless and Nameless LordA ! Salutation to Thee O Destroyer and Restorer of three modes Lord !
Salutation tho Thee O Eternal Enity LordA Salutation to Thee O Unique in all respects LordA 147.

gurmukhi: n poqRY n pu`qRY ] n s`qRY n im`qRY ]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art Sonless and Grandsonless. O Lord! Thou art Enemyless and Friendless.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨ ਪੋਤ੍ਰੈ ਨ ਪੁੱਤ੍ਰੈ ॥ ਨ ਸੱਤ੍ਰੈ ਨ ਮਿੱਤ੍ਰੈ ॥

gurmukhi: n qwqY n mwqY ] n jwqY n pwqY ]148]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art Fatherless and Motherless. O Lord! Thou art Casteless. And Lineagless. 148.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨ ਤਾਤੈ ਨ ਮਾਤੈ ॥ ਨ ਜਾਤੈ ਨ ਪਾਤੈ ॥੧੪੮॥

gurmukhi: inRswkM srIk hYN ] Aimqo AmIk hYN ]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art Relativeless. O Lord! Thou art Limitless and Profound.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨ੍ਰਿਸਾਕੰ ਸਰੀਕ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਅਮਿਤੋ ਅਮੀਕ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: sdYvM pRBw hYN ] AjY hYN Ajw hYN ]149]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art Ever Glorious. O Lord! Thou art Unconquerable and Unborn. 149.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਸਦੈਵੰ ਪ੍ਰਭਾ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਅਜੈ ਹੈਂ ਅਜਾ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੪੯॥

translation_english: BHAGVATI STANZA. BY THY GRACE

gurmukhi: ik zwhr zhUr hYN ] ik hwzr hzUr hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art visible illumination. That Thou art All-Prevading.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਜ਼ਾਹਰ ਜ਼ਹੂਰ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਹਾਜ਼ਰ ਹਜ਼ੂਰ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: hmysul slwm hYN ] smsqul klwm hYN ]150]
translation_english: That Thou art reveiver of Eternal conpliments. That Thou art Venerated by all. 150
gurmukhi_unicode: ਹਮੇਸੁਲ ਸਲਾਮ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਸਮਸਤੁਲ ਕਲਾਮ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੫੦॥

gurmukhi: ik swihb idmwZ hYN ] ik husnl crwZ hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art Most Intelligent. That Thou art the Lamp of Beauty.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਾਹਿਬ ਦਿਮਾਗ਼ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਹੁਸਨਲ ਚਰਾਗ਼ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: ik kwml krIm hYN ] ik rwzk rhIm hYN ]151]
translation_english: That Thou art completely Generous. That Thou art Sustainer and Merciful.151.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਕਾਮਲ ਕਰੀਮ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਰਾਜ਼ਕ ਰਹੀਮ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੫੧॥

gurmukhi: ik rozI idihMd hYN ] ik rwzk rihMd hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art Giver of Sustenance. That Thou art ever the Sustainer.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਰੋਜ਼ੀ ਦਿਹਿੰਦ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਰਾਜ਼ਕ ਰਹਿੰਦ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: krImul kmwl hYN ] ik husnl jmwl hYN ]152]
translation_english: That Thou art the perfection of Generosity. That Thou art Most Beautiful. 152.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਰੀਮੁਲ ਕਮਾਲ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਹੁਸਨਲ ਜਮਾਲ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੫੨॥

gurmukhi: ZnImul i^rwj hYN ] ZrIbul invwz hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art the Penaliser of enemies. That Thou art the Supporter of the poor.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਗ਼ਨੀਮੁਲ ਖ਼ਿਰਾਜ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਗ਼ਰੀਬੁਲ ਨਿਵਾਜ਼ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: hri&ul iSkMn hYN ] ihrwsul iPkMn hYN ]153]
translation_english: That Thou art the Destroyer of enemies That Thou art the remover of Fear. 153.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਹਰਫ਼ੁਲ ਸ਼ਿਕੰਨ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਹਿਰਾਸੁਲ ਫਿਕੰਨ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੫੩॥

gurmukhi: klMkM pRxws hYN ] smsqul invws hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art the Destroyer of blemishes. That Thou art the dweller in all.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਲੰਕੰ ਪ੍ਰਣਾਸ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਸਮਸਤੁਲ ਨਿਵਾਸ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: AgMjul gnIm hYN ] rjwiek rhIm hYN ]154]
translation_english: That Thou art invincible by enemies. That Thou art the Sustainer and Gracious. 154.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਅਗੰਜੁਲ ਗਨੀਮ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਰਜਾਇਕ ਰਹੀਮ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੫੪॥

gurmukhi: smsqul jubW hYN ] ik swihb ikrW hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art the Master of all languages. That Thou art the Most Glorious.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਸਮਸਤੁਲ ਜੁਬਾਂ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਸਾਹਿਬ ਕਿਰਾਂ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: ik nrkM pRxws hYN ] bihsqul invws hYN ]155]
translation_english: That Thou art the Destroyer of hell. That Thou art the dweller in heaven.155.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਨਰਕੰ ਪ੍ਰਣਾਸ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਬਹਿਸਤੁਲ ਨਿਵਾਸ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੫੫॥

gurmukhi: ik srbul gvMn hYN ] hmysul rvMn hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art the Goer to all. That Thou art ever Blissful.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਸਰਬੁਲ ਗਵੰਨ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਹਮੇਸੁਲ ਰਵੰਨ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: qmwmul qmIj hYN ] smsqul AjIj hYN ]156]
translation_english: That Thou art the knower of all. That Thou art dearest to all. 156.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਤਮਾਮੁਲ ਤਮੀਜ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਸਮਸਤੁਲ ਅਜੀਜ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੫੬॥

gurmukhi: prM prm eIs hYN ] smsqul AdIs hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art the Lord of lords. That Thou art hidden from all.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਪਰੰ ਪਰਮ ਈਸ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਸਮਸਤੁਲ ਅਦੀਸ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: Adysul AlyK hYN ] hmysul AByK hYN ]157]
translation_english: That Thou art countryless and accountless. That Thou art ever garbles. 157.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਅਦੇਸੁਲ ਅਲੇਖ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਹਮੇਸੁਲ ਅਭੇਖ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੫੭॥

gurmukhi: zmInul zmw hYN ] AmIkul iemw hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art in Earth and Heaven.. That Thou art Most Profound in signs.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਜ਼ਮੀਨੁਲ ਜ਼ਮਾ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਅਮੀਕੁਲ ਇਮਾ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: krImul kmwl hYN ] ik jurAiq jmwl hYN ]158]
translation_english: That Thou art Most Generous. That Thou art embodiment of courage and beauty. 158.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਰੀਮੁਲ ਕਮਾਲ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਜੁਰਅਤਿ ਜਮਾਲ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੫੮॥

gurmukhi: ik AclM pRkws hYN ] ik Aimqo subws hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art perpetual illumination. That Thou art Limitless fragrance.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਅਚਲੰ ਪ੍ਰਕਾਸ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਅਮਿਤੋ ਸੁਬਾਸ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: ik Ajb srUp hYN ] ik Aimqo ibBUq hYN ]159]
translation_english: That Thou art wonderful entity. That Thou art Limitless Grandeur. 159.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਅਜਬ ਸਰੂਪ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਅਮਿਤੋ ਬਿਭੂਤ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੫੯॥

gurmukhi: ik Aimqo psw hYN ] ik Awqm pRBw hYN ]
translation_english: That Thou art Limitless Expanse. That Thou art selfluminous.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਅਮਿਤੋ ਪਸਾ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਆਤਮ ਪ੍ਰਭਾ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: ik AclM AnMg hYN ] ik Aimqo ABMg hYN ]160]
translation_english: That Thou art Steady and Limbless. That Thou art Infinite and Indestructible. 160.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਿ ਅਚਲੰ ਅਨੰਗ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਿ ਅਮਿਤੋ ਅਭੰਗ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੬੦॥

translation_english: MADHUBHAR STANZA. BY THY GRACE.

gurmukhi: muin min pRnwm ] guin gn mudwm ]
translation_english: O Lord! The sages bow before Thee in their mind. O Lord! Thou art ever the Treasure of virtues.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਮੁਨਿ ਮਨਿ ਪ੍ਰਨਾਮ ॥ ਗੁਨਿ ਗਨ ਮੁਦਾਮ ॥

gurmukhi: Air br AgMj ] hir nr pRBMj ]161]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou canst not be destroyed by great enemies. O Lord! Thou art the Destroyer of all.161.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਅਰਿ ਬਰ ਅਗੰਜ ॥ ਹਰਿ ਨਰ ਪ੍ਰਭੰਜ ॥੧੬੧॥

gurmukhi: An gn pRnwm ] muin min slwm ]
translation_english: O Lord! Innumerable beings bow before Thee. O Lord! The sages salute Thee in their mind.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਅਨ ਗਨ ਪ੍ਰਨਾਮ ॥ ਮੁਨਿ ਮਨਿ ਸਲਾਮ ॥

gurmukhi: hir nr AKMf ] br nr AmMf ]162]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art complete controller of men. O Lord! Thou canst not be installed by the chiefs. 162.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਹਰਿ ਨਰ ਅਖੰਡ ॥ ਬਰ ਨਰ ਅਮੰਡ ॥੧੬੨॥

translation_english: O Lord! Thou art eternal knowledge. O Lord! Thou art illumined in the hearts of the sages.

gurmukhi: guin gn pRnwm ] jl Ql mudwm ]163]
translation_english: O Lord! The assemblies of virtuous bow before thee. O Lord! Thou pervadest in water and on land. 163.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਗੁਨਿ ਗਨ ਪ੍ਰਨਾਮ ॥ ਜਲ ਥਲ ਮੁਦਾਮ ॥੧੬੩॥

translation_english: O Lord! Thy body is unbreakable. O Lord! Thy seat is perpetual.
O Lord! Thy Praises are boundless. O Lord! Thy nature is most Generous. 164.

gurmukhi: jl Ql AmMf ] ids ivs ABMf ]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art most glorious in water and on land. O Lord! Thou art free from slander at all places.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਜਲ ਥਲ ਅਮੰਡ ॥ ਦਿਸ ਵਿਸ ਅਭੰਡ ॥

gurmukhi: jl Ql mhMq ] ids ivs ibAMq ]165]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art Supreme in water and on land. O Lord! Thou art endless in all directions. 165.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਜਲ ਥਲ ਮਹੰਤ ॥ ਦਿਸ ਵਿਸ ਬਿਅੰਤ ॥੧੬੫॥

translation_english: O Lord! Thou art eternal knowledge. O Lord! Thou art Supreme among the contented ones.
O Lord! Thou art the arm of gods. O Lord! Thou art ever the Only One. 166.
O Lord! Thou art AUM, the origin of creation. O Lord! Thou art stated to be without beginning.

gurmukhi: Kl KMf iKAwl ] gur br Akwl ]167]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou destroyest the tyrants instantly. O Lord thou art supreme and Immortal. 167.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਖਲ ਖੰਡ ਖਿਆਲ ॥ ਗੁਰ ਬਰ ਅਕਾਲ ॥੧੬੭॥

gurmukhi: Gr Gir pRnwm ] icq crn nwm ]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art honoured in every house. O Lord! Thy Feet and Thy Name are meditated in every heart.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਘਰ ਘਰਿ ਪ੍ਰਨਾਮ ॥ ਚਿਤ ਚਰਨ ਨਾਮ ॥

translation_english: O Lord! Thy body never becomes old. O Lord! Thou art never subservient to anybody. 168.
O Lord! Thy body is ever steady. O Lord! Thou art free from rage.
O Lord! Thy store is inexhaustible. O Lord! Thou art uninstalled and boundless. 169.
O Lord! Thy Law is imperceptible. O Lord! Thy actions are most fearless.
O Lord! Thou art Invincible and Infinite. O Lord! Thou art the Supreme Donor. 170.
HARIBOLMANA STANZA, BY THE GRACE
O Lord! Thou art the house of Mercy. Lord! Thou art The Destroyer of enemies.

gurmukhi: Kl KMfn hYN ] mih mMfn hYN ]171]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art the killer of evil persons. O Lord! Thou art the ornamentation of Earth. 171.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਖਲ ਖੰਡਨ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਮਹਿ ਮੰਡਨ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੭੧॥

translation_english: O Lord! Thou art the Master of the universe. O Lord! Thou art the supreme Ishvara.

gurmukhi: kil kwrx hYN ] srb aubwrx hYN ]172]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art the cause of strife. O Lord! Thou art the Saviour of all. 172.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਲਿ ਕਾਰਣ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਸਰਬ ਉਬਾਰਣ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੭੨॥

gurmukhi: iDRq ky DRx hYN ] jg ky kRx hYN ]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art the support of the Earth. O Lord! Thou art the Creator of the Universe.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਧ੍ਰਿਤ ਕੇ ਧ੍ਰਣ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਜਗ ਕੇ ਕ੍ਰਣ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: mn mwinX hYN ] jg jwinX hYN ]173]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art worshipped in the heart. O Lord! Thou art known throughout the world.173.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਮਨ ਮਾਨਿਯ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਜਗ ਜਾਨਿਯ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੭੩॥

gurmukhi: srbM Br hYN ] srbM kr hYN ]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art the Sustainer of all. O Lord! Thou art the Creator of all.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਸਰਬੰ ਭਰ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਸਰਬੰ ਕਰ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: srb pwisX hYN ] srb nwisX hYN ]174]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou pervadest all. O Lord! Thou destroyest all. 174.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਸਰਬ ਪਾਸਿਯ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਸਰਬ ਨਾਸਿਯ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੭੪॥

translation_english: O Lord! Thou art the Fountain of Mercy. O Lord! Thou art the nourisher of the universe.
O Lord! Thou art master of all. Lord! Thou art the Master of Universe. 175
O Lord! Thou art the life of the Universe. O Lord! Thou art the destroyer of evil-doers.

gurmukhi: pr qy pr hYN ] kruxwkr hYN ]176]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art beyond everything. O Lord! Thou art the Fountain of Mercy. 176.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਪਰ ਤੇ ਪਰ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਰੁਣਾਕਰ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੭੬॥

translation_english: O Lord! Thou art the unmuttered mantra. O Lord! Thou canst be installed by none.

gurmukhi: AikRqw ikRq hYN ] AimRqw imRq hYN ]177]
translation_english: O Lord! Thy Image canst not be fashioned. O Lord! Thou art Immortal. 177.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਅਕ੍ਰਿਤਾ ਕ੍ਰਿਤ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਅਮ੍ਰਿਤਾ ਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੭੭॥

gurmukhi: AimRqw imRq hYN ] krxw ikRq hYN ]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art immortal. O Lord! Thou art the Merciful Entity.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਅਮ੍ਰਿਤਾ ਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕਰਣਾ ਕ੍ਰਿਤ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: AikRqw ikRq hYN ] DrxI iDRq hYN ]178]
translation_english: O Lord Thy Image canst not be fashioned. O Lord! Thou art the Support of the Earth. 178.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਅਕ੍ਰਿਤਾ ਕ੍ਰਿਤ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਧਰਣੀ ਧ੍ਰਿਤ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੭੮॥

translation_english: O Lord! Thou art the Master of Nectar. O Lord! Thou art Supreme Ishvara.

gurmukhi: AikRqw ikRq hYN ] AimRqw imRq hYN ]179]
translation_english: O Lord! Thy Image canst not be fashioned. O Lord! Thou art Immortal. 179.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਅਕ੍ਰਿਤਾ ਕ੍ਰਿਤ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਅਮ੍ਰਿਤਾ ਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੭੯॥

gurmukhi: Ajbw ikRq hYN ] AimRqw AimRq hYN ]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art of Wonderful Form.O Lord! Thou art Immortal.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਅਜਬਾ ਕ੍ਰਿਤ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਅਮ੍ਰਿਤਾ ਅਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: nr nwiek hYN ] Kl Gwiek hYN ]180]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art the Master of men. O Lord! Thou art the destroyer of evil persons. 180.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨਰ ਨਾਇਕ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਖਲ ਘਾਇਕ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੮੦॥

translation_english: O Lord! Thou art the Nourisher of the world. O Lord! Thou art the House of Mercy.

gurmukhi: inRp nwiek hYN ] srb pwiek hYN ]181]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art the Lord of the kings. O Lord! Thou art the Protector of all. 181.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨ੍ਰਿਪ ਨਾਇਕ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਸਰਬ ਪਾਇਕ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੮੧॥

gurmukhi: Bv BMjn hYN ] Air gMjn hYN ]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art the destroyer of the cycle of transmigration. O Lord! Thou art the conqueror of enemies.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਭਵ ਭੰਜਨ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਅਰਿ ਗੰਜਨ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: irpu qwpn hYN ] jpu jwpn hYN ]182]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou causest suffering to the enemies. O Lord! Thou makest others to repeat Thy Name.182.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਰਿਪੁ ਤਾਪਨ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਜਪੁ ਜਾਪਨ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੮੨॥

gurmukhi: AklM ikRq hYN ] srbw ikRq hYN ]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art free from blemishes. O Lord! All are Thy Forms.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਅਕਲੰ ਕ੍ਰਿਤ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਸਰਬਾ ਕ੍ਰਿਤ ਹੈਂ ॥

gurmukhi: krqw kr hYN ] hrqw hir hYN ]183]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art the Creator of the creators. O Lord! Thou art the Destroyer of the destroyers. 183.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਕਰਤਾ ਕਰ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਹਰਤਾ ਹਰਿ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੮੩॥

translation_english: O Lord! Thou art the Supreme Soul. Lord! Thou art the origin of all the souls.

gurmukhi: Awqm bs hYN ] js ky js hYN ]184]
translation_english: O Lord! Thou art controlled by Thyself. O Lord! Thou art not subject. 184.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਆਤਮ ਬਸ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਜਸ ਕੇ ਜਸ ਹੈਂ ॥੧੮੪॥

translation_english: BHUJANG PRAYAAT STANZA

gurmukhi: nmo sUrj sUrjy nmo cMdR cMdRy ]
translation_english: Salutation to Thee O Sun of suns! Salutation to Thee O Moon of moons!
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨਮੋ ਸੂਰਜ ਸੂਰਜੇ ਨਮੋ ਚੰਦ੍ਰ ਚੰਦ੍ਰੇ ॥

gurmukhi: nmo rwj rwjy nmo ieMdR ieMdRy ]
translation_english: Salutation to Thee O King of kings! Salutation to thee O Indra of Indras!
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨਮੋ ਰਾਜ ਰਾਜੇ ਨਮੋ ਇੰਦ੍ਰ ਇੰਦ੍ਰੇ ॥

translation_english: Salutation to Thee O Creator of pitch darkness! Salutation to Thee O Light of lights.!

gurmukhi: nmo ibRMd ibRMdy nmo bIj bIjy ]185]
translation_english: Salutation to Thee O Greatest of the great (multitudes) Salutation to Three O Subtlest of the subtle ! 185
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨਮੋ ਬ੍ਰਿੰਦ ਬ੍ਰਿੰਦੇ ਨਮੋ ਬੀਜ ਬੀਜੇ ॥੧੮੫॥

translation_english: Salutation to Thee O embodiment of peace! Salutation to Thee O Entity bearing three modes!
Salutation to Thee O Supreme Essence and Elementless Entity!

gurmukhi: nmo jog jogy nmo igAwn igAwny ]
translation_english: Salutation to Thee O Fountain of all Yogas! Salutation to Thee O Fountain of all knowledge!
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨਮੋ ਜੋਗ ਜੋਗੇ ਨਮੋ ਗਿਆਨ ਗਿਆਨੇ ॥

gurmukhi: nmo mMqR mMqRy nmo iDAwn iDAwny ]186]
translation_english: Salutation to Thee O Supreme Mantra! Salutation to Thee O highest meditation 186.
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨਮੋ ਮੰਤ੍ਰ ਮੰਤ੍ਰੇ ਨਮੋ ਧਿਆਨ ਧਿਆਨੇ ॥੧੮੬॥

gurmukhi: nmo juD juDy nmo igAwn igAwny ]
translation_english: Salutation to Thee O Conqueror of wars! Salutation to Thee O Fountain of all knowledge!
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨਮੋ ਜੁਧ ਜੁਧੇ ਨਮੋ ਗਿਆਨ ਗਿਆਨੇ ॥

gurmukhi: nmo Boj Bojy nmo pwn pwny ]
translation_english: Salutation to Thee O Essence of Food ! Salutation to Thee O Essence of Warter !
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨਮੋ ਭੋਜ ਭੋਜੇ ਨਮੋ ਪਾਨ ਪਾਨੇ ॥

gurmukhi: nmo klh krqw nmo sWq rUpy ]
translation_english: Salutation to Thee O Originator of Food! Salutation to Thee O Embodiment of Peace!
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨਮੋ ਕਲਹ ਕਰਤਾ ਨਮੋ ਸਾਂਤ ਰੂਪੇ ॥

translation_english: Salutation to Thee O Indra of Indras! Salutation to Thee O Beginningless Effulgence! 187.
Salutation to Thee O Entity inimical to blemishes! Salutation to Thee O Ornamentation of the ornaments

gurmukhi: nmo Aws Awsy nmo bWk bMky ]
translation_english: Salutation to Thee O Fulfiller of hopes! Salutation to Thee O Most Beautiful!
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨਮੋ ਆਸ ਆਸੇ ਨਮੋ ਬਾਂਕ ਬੰਕੇ ॥

translation_english: Salutation to Thee O Eternal Entity, Limbless and Nameless!
Salutation to Thee O Destroyer of three worlds in three tenses! Salutation to O Limbless and Desireless Lord! 188.
EK ACHHARI STANZA
O Unconquerable Lord! O Indestructible Lord! O Fearless Lord! 189.
O Unborn Lord! O Perpetual Lord! O Indestructible Lord! O All-Pervasive Lord! 190.
Eternal Lord! O Indivisible Lord! O Unknowable Lord! O Uninflammable Lord! 191
O Non-Temporal Lord! O Merciful Lord! O Accountless Lord! O Guiseless Lord! 192.
O Nameless Lord! O Desireless Lord! O Unfathomable Lord! O Unfaltering Lord! 193.
O Masterless Lord! O Greatest-Glorious Lord! O Birthless Lord! O Silenceless Lord! 194.

gurmukhi: n rwgy ] n rMgy ] n rUpy ] n ryKy ]195]
translation_english: O Unattached Lord ! O Colorless Lord ! O Formless Lord ! O Lineless Lord ! 195
gurmukhi_unicode: ਨ ਰਾਗੇ ॥ ਨ ਰੰਗੇ ॥ ਨ ਰੂਪੇ ॥ ਨ ਰੇਖੇ ॥੧੯੫॥

translation_english: O Actionless Lord! O Illusionless Lord! O Indestructible Lord! O Accountless Lord! 196
BHUJANG PRAYAAT STANZA
Salutation to Thee O Most Venerated and Destroyer of all Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Indestructible, Nameless and All-Pervading Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Desireless, Glorious and All-Pervading Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Destroyer of Evil and Illuminator of Supreme Piety Lord! 197.
Salutation to Thee O Perpetual Embodiment of Truth, Consciousness and Bliss and Destroyer of enemies Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Gracious Creator and All-Pervading Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Wonderful, Glorious and Calamity for enemies Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Destroyer, Creator, Gracious and Merciful Lord! 198.

gurmukhi: c`qR c`kR vrqI c`qR c`kR Bugqy ]
translation_english: Salutation to Thee O Pervader and Enjoyer in all the four directions Lord!
gurmukhi_unicode: ਚੱਤ੍ਰ ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਵਰਤੀ ਚੱਤ੍ਰ ਚੱਕ੍ਰ ਭੁਗਤੇ ॥

translation_english: Salutation to Thee O Self-Existent, Most Beautiful and United with all Lord!
Salutation to Thee O Destroyer of hard times and Embodiment of Mercy Lord!
Salutation to thee O Ever present with all, Indestructible and Glorious Lord! 199.
